sentence.Network_en: He was found desperately trying to untangle several reels of film.
sentence.Network_cn: 他被撞见拼命想要解开几盘缠在一起的胶卷。

sentence.Network_en: The Ministry desperately tried to hush up the whole affair.
sentence.Network_cn: 部里拼命想隐瞒整个事件。

sentence.Network_en: His gross misman-agement left the company desperately in need of restructuring.
sentence.Network_cn: 他管理上的重大失误使公司陷入亟须重组的境地。

entry.tran: （因绝望而）孤注一掷的，铤而走险的，拼命的
entry.def: If you are desperate, you are in such a bad situation that you are willing to try anything to change it.

example.ex: Troops are needed to help get food into Kosovo where people are in desperate need...
example.tran: 需要军队帮助将科索沃人民亟需的食品送抵那里。

example.ex: Desperate with anxiety, Bob and Hans searched the whole house...
example.tran: 焦急万分的鲍勃和汉斯把整座房子找了个遍。

entry.def: If you are desperate for something or desperate to do something, you want or need it very much indeed.

example.ex: They'd been married nearly four years and June was desperate to start a family...
example.tran: 他们结婚已快4年了，琼非常渴望要个孩子。

example.ex: People are desperate for him to do something.
example.tran: 人们极希望他能做点什么。

entry.tran: 极困难的;极严重的;极危险的
entry.def: A desperate situation is very difficult, serious, or dangerous.

example.ex: India's United Nations ambassador said the situation is desperate...
example.tran: 印度驻联合国大使说形势非常危急。

example.ex: I decided not to abandon John when he was in such a desperate position.
example.tran: 我决定不在约翰走投无路的时候抛弃他。

sentences.sentence: "the child clung desperately to her mother"

auth_sentence.content: They desperately want to see the victim really soon.
auth_sentence.res_content: They desperately want to see the victim really soon.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They desperately want to see the victim really soon.

auth_sentence.content: Muffled, distorted voices cry desperately throughout the song.
auth_sentence.res_content: Muffled, distorted voices cry desperately throughout the song.

auth_sentence.content: But such a revival can't be desperately fast.
auth_sentence.res_content: But such a revival can't be desperately fast.

Sentence.sentence: They save up cash and desperately cut spending.

means.word_mean: 绝望地;不顾一切地,拼命地

sentences.en: desperately striving for some sort of dignity
sentences.cn: 为了某种尊严拼命努力

sentences.en: He cut desperately at the rope in an attempt to free his foot.
sentences.cn: 他拼命砍绳子,试图把自己的脚解脱开。

sentences.en: The man in the river desperately tried to reach the side.
sentences.cn: 那个落水的人拼命想游到河岸边。

sentences.en: He was desperately seeking a way to see her again.
sentences.cn: 他正拼命想办法再见她一面。

sentences.en: He longed desperately to be back at home.
He was desperately eager to be back after more than a week’s absence from school.
sentences.cn: 他离校一个多星期以后,回校之心甚切。
